definition: to pluck (a string)/to play (a string instrument)/to spring or leap/to shoot (e.g. with a catapult)/(of cotton) to fluff or tease/to flick/to flip/to accuse/to impeach/elastic (of materials)

sentences.english: He sliced the ball, and it bounced back over the net.
sentences.chinese: 他踢出一記迴旋球，球彈到球網上彈了回來。

sentences.english: Hippo bounces a ball off of Penguin´s head (BOINK!
sentences.chinese: 而河馬呢，居然把球彈到了企鵝的頭上。

sentences.english: The plastic ball ball is one kind hangs the quantity extremely light polystyrene pellet.
sentences.chinese: 塑料球彈是一種垂量極輕的聚苯乙烯小球。
